# INShortcut.userActivity(_:)

**Case**

The user activity that defines the action to perform when invoking the shortcut.

## Declaration

```swift
case userActivity(NSUserActivity)
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **INShortcut.intent(_:)**: The intent that performs the action when invoking the shortcut.

items.description: The intent that performs the action when invoking the shortcut.
items.name: INShortcut.intent(_:)
